version_description:

- New hotel "Blue Crystal Resort"
- New missions
- Bug fixes and balancing changes

Release version:

- New hotel available
- Optimization of loading times when opening the app and traveling between hotels.
- Loss of progress problems solved.
- Minor bug fixes, and performance improvements

Developments:

Swipe-sides feature between rooms

Notification to detect non-available dirty rooms

Japanese text corrections
